item.title: Professional CD Crafting with CDRDAO
item.description: All digital music listeners are equal. Acquisition is painless. Taste is irrelevant. It is pointless to boast about your iTunes collection, or the quality of your playlists on a streaming service. Music became data, one more set of 1’s and 0’s lurking in your hard drive, invisible to see and impossible to touch. Nothing is less cool than data. ~ David Sax Physical media is back. vinyl and cassette sales are through the roof, and why shouldn’t they be?

item.title: Buswarn: RasPi-based Transit Bus Tracking
item.description: Public transportation is like a magnifying glass that shows you civilization up close. ~ Chris Gethard What is Buswarn? During the COVID year, I moved off-campus. I didn’t realize at the time, but my only lifeline to my in-person classes, study rooms, and meals would be the Texas A&M Bus Transit System. Problems manifested themselves quickly. Buses ran at seemingly random intervals, and the website that displayed the schedule often had errors rendering on my mobile phone.
